original_text: A servant brought a message to Job. He said, ‘We were using your oxen to plough the fields. Your donkeys were eating grass beside them.
korean_text: 사환이 욥에게 와서 아뢰되 소는 밭을 갈고 나귀는 그 곁에서 풀을 먹는데

sentences.original_text: A servant brought a message to Job
We were using your oxen to plough the fields
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신의 소들을 밭을 가는 데 사용하고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Your donkeys were eating grass beside them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 당나귀들은 그들 곁에서 풀을 먹고 있었습니다
